scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Julia Gardiner Tyler, Sherwood Forest, Virginia, writes to [Anna Cora Odgen Mowatt] Ritchie, Richmond, Virginia on February 11, 1856. She discusses in detail: receipt of a copy of Mimic Life; isolation brought on by terrible winter weather; Mount Vernon fund-raising; apprehension about the upcoming birth of Robert Fitzwalter Tyler.
